job_description:
About the job
Job Overview:
We are looking for a Laravel Trainee who is passionate about web development and eager to learn and grow in a dynamic environment. The ideal candidate should have a solid foundation in PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, and frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and AJAX. This role requires someone who is a self-learner, can work independently, and has a strong grasp of SQL/MySQL databases.

About the job
Harpy Studio is looking for a Business Developer to help us secure remote projects and partnerships in the gaming industry. If you're passionate about gaming, skilled in sales and networking, and eager to help a game development studio grow, we want to hear from you!
What You'll Do
✅ Identify and pursue remote job opportunities and project collaborations for our studio.
✅ Build relationships with potential clients, publishers, and partners in the IT industry.

About the job
Dionix, owned by E com Advise LTD, is a UK-based agency with years of experience working with numerous local, national, and international brands to enhance their marketplace presence. The agency offers smart and innovative digital solutions that deliver immediate and measurable results.

Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role located in Islamabad for a Word press /Shopify Developer at Dionix. The Developer will be responsible for responsive web design, web design, and Shopify Development tasks.

About the job
We are looking for an ambitious and self-driven Front-end Developer to join our team. As a Front-end Developer, you will be responsible for implementing visual elements that users see and interact with within a web application, which makes your role crucial for the success of our business.

Use a variety of programming languages to create user-friendly web pages
Maintain and improve the company website
